body_html:
But parameters are flattened? I've never seen broadcast take 180ms (though I did not run resnet 1001). Using torch.cat instead of memcopy to flatten parameters makes some difference.
And remove broadcasting buffers, it's useless, as we've discussed :-)

body:
But parameters are flattened? I've never seen broadcast take 180ms (though I did not run resnet 1001). Using torch.cat instead of memcopy to flatten parameters makes some difference.  
And remove broadcasting buffers, it's useless, as we've discussed :-)
